Pre-Game Insights: Experts predicted India as the favorites given their home advantage.
The Kohli vs. Shaheen Afridi battle was highlighted as a key contest.
India have long been the benchmark ODI side but even they'll know Rashid and Gurbaz, on their day, can trip them up.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Afghanistan have played a mere 29 matches between the last World Cup and this one.
There are individual players in the Indian team that they'll face on Wednesday who have played almost twice as many matches.
The weather will be mostly cloudy for this 2023 World Cup game. Rain isn't expected throughout the course of the match. The temperature will hover around 30 degrees Celsius.
Others: The pitch for this match will likely help the batters. South Africa and Sri Lanka scored more than 700 runs in the last match at this venue.
Teams batting first have won five of the last six ODIs here dating back to 2013.
